# Lab 1
/**
 * Brief:
 * This code shows how to configure gpio and how to use gpio interrupt.
 * GPIO status:
 * GPIO0: output
 * GPIO2: input, pulled up, interrupt from falling edge
 * Test:
 * Connect GPIO0 with GPIO2
 * Generate pulses on GPIO0, that triggers interrupt on GPIO2
 *
 */
